attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over these past weeks it has become clear to all that the current crop of MP's are not to be trusted and that some may even be liable to criminal prosecution. For this reason this Government does not have the confidence of the eletorate as a whole and the only fair and sincere thing to do is give the electorate a chance to make up there own minds.
Therefore I petition the government of the UK to call a general election as soon as is possible after the June elections this year 2009.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
